promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive rare gecko fire-type pokemon wearing a fiery crystal headband. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Blazicrest, a a massive rare gecko fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Indomitable Blaze. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gecko", "fire" or "Blazicrest". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, gecko-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: This stunning creature, residing in arid landscapes, is known for its intense, incandescent power. Using Indomitable Blaze, this grand reptile illuminates both day and night.
